p: As seen in Table 6, fecal oocyst counts were affected by the dietary essential oil supplementation. On day 28, the ORE-GAR treatment had significantly lower ( p < 0.01) counts by 0.317 units (log10/g feces), and on day 37 it had significantly lower ( p < 0.001) counts by 0.532 units (log10/g feces).
